item.dc:creator: @xjadefighter xjadefighter
item.description:
@xjadefighter wrote:

It just takes time, as i no longer really do anything to do with rsps or rs.

But i will do it tomorrow for you if you are desperate, also, i will make the colour right, cus atm it looks orange don’t it :/[/quote]

Ya and it sucks that u quit you were far the best model maker* on these forums =]

item.title: Dragon Claw Models
item.dc:creator: @xjadefighter xjadefighter
item.description:
@xjadefighter wrote:

[quote=“DRAGON GIRL, post:6, topic:259548”] if(i == 13025) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 13699; //Model ID // 20233 class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 13698;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 13698;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon claws";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes();//examin info }

        class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle

the 1 u posted wasnt it and all the 1s i changed it too werent it eather can some1 post 1 thats just like the pic??
